document_data.mainbody:
he Dead Mans Corner was a ramshackle and crammed shop in Skullport that traded in human zombies in the late 15 century DR.
The shop was run by a sea hag disguised as an old woman named Olive Stillwater in the . Her inventory included twelve zombies on average. Her corpses came with a leash for the buyer to drag their zombies around. These leashes were nooses around zombies necks. Each shambler was sold for a humble price of a single vial of the buyers blood and three hairs from their head.
